title: A discussion of cancer and how to help cure it with the water in our cells
itunes:title: A discussion of cancer and how to help cure it with the water in our cells
description:
George and Dr. Thomas Cowan discuss the role of water in our cells and how it can help cure cancer. Dr. Cowan also gives his take on vaccines and the immune system.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
